| accessdate=2008-10-10}}</ref> This is a potential legal problem for [[Linux distribution]]s wishing to distribute Moonlight. (For example, see the [http://lists.debian.org/debian-devel/2008/10/threads.html#00063 discussion on debian-devel].) Microsoft makes it clear that anyone who distributes Moonlight is not protected by their Covenant to Downstream Recipients of Moonlight. (See their definition of "Downstream Recipient".)
